item.title: Overview
item.description: Use Cases ## Use Cases ##### Wherever integrity and authenticity of data is required: - Educational Certification - Protection of Intellectual Property - Counterfeit proof Contracts ### Other use cases - Identification and Access - Identity Claims - Verifiable news *Revision Controlled Journalism* - Solve invoicing fraud

item.title: Overview
item.description: Use Cases Whereever integrity and authenticity of data is required: - Educational Certification - Protection of Intellectual Property - Counterfeit proof Contracts ### Other use cases - Identification and Access - Identity Claims - Verifiable news and reporting ‘Revision Controlled Journalism’ - Solve invoicing fraud EMREX ![](/images/various/emrex.png) ## EMREX This standard ... a process for securely transferring educational results for a student between two institutions - https://emrex.
